title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4025.24 - Striking out of engagement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4025.24 - Striking out of engagement

State Regulations

No horse shall be considered as struck out of any of
such horse's engagements until the owner or the owner's authorized agent shall
have given notice, in writing or by printable electronic means, promptly
confirmed in writing, to the clerk of the course where the horse is
engaged. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4025.24

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
